name: King
description: Moves one square in any direction.

name: Queen
description: Moves any number of squares diagonally, horizontally, or vertically.

name: The Rook
description: Moves any number of squares horizontally or vertical.

name: The Bishop
description: Moves any number of squares diagonally.

name: The Knight
description: Moves in an ‘L-shape,’ two squares in a straight direction, and then one square perpendicular to that.

name: The Pawn
description: Moves one square forward, but on its first move, it can move two squares forward. It captures diagonally one square forward.
